description:
ESET Endpoint Antivirus is a complete security solution that is
	the result is an optimal combination of degrees
	protection with minimal impact on computer performance. Modern technologies,
	based on the use of artificial intelligence, capable of proactively counteracting
	infected viruses, spyware, trojans, adware, worms, rootkits and others
	attack from the Internet without affecting computer performance and interruptions in work.
	ESET Endpoint Antivirus is designed for use on workstations in environments
	small businesses. Using ESET Endpoint Antivirus in conjunction with ESET Remote Administrator in
	corporate environment allows
	apply policies and rules, detect detectable threats, and remotely configure clients with
	any computer connected to the network.
	Fast, light and invisible antivirus protects everything you treasure on your Windows, Mac, Android or Linux.
author: ESET
